}} The 'Center for Inquiry' ('CFI') is a non-profit educational organization
with headquarters in the United States whose primary mission is to encourage evidence-
based inquiry into paranormal and fringe science claims, alternative medicine
and mental health practices, religion, secular ethics, and society. CFI is
dedicated to promoting and defending science, reason, and free inquiry in all
aspects of human interest.
